item.title: [PHP] Finding a string in an array
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

I want to compare a variable against elements of an array. Such as:

$variable = GetHostByName($_SERVER['REMOTE_ADDR']);
$bannedList = array('192.168.1.1', '192.168.1.2', '192.168.1.3');

How do I have it let me know if ‘192.168.1.1’ is one of the members of the array? I want to use this but putting banned IP’s in an array, get the user’s IP, then compare it to a bank of banned IP’s. Any ideas?

Read full topic
item.source: [PHP] Finding a string in an array
